Infrastructure & Real Estate.title: IndiGo to increase flights to Manchester
Infrastructure & Real Estate.one_liner: IndiGo plans to increase its flight frequency to Manchester.
bullets: This expansion reflects IndiGo's strategy to enhance its international reach, catering to growing demand.
Increased flights can benefit travelers and enhance trade links between India and the UK.

Infrastructure & Real Estate.title: Pvt jet skids off runway at Farrukhabad airstrip
Infrastructure & Real Estate.one_liner: A private jet skidded off the runway in Farrukhabad, Uttar Pradesh.
bullets: The incident raises safety concerns regarding private aviation operations in India.
No casualties reported; however, it emphasizes the need for stricter regulations.

Infrastructure & Real Estate.title: AI, sustainable practices driving construction
Infrastructure & Real Estate.one_liner: AI technologies are enhancing construction quality control and safety in India.
bullets: AI-driven technologies improve structural safety, reducing human error and enhancing longevity.
Investment in AI can position India as a leader in sustainable construction practices.

Infrastructure & Real Estate.title: IndiGo launches flights to Copenhagen; its third European launch this year
Infrastructure & Real Estate.one_liner: IndiGo has launched new flights to Copenhagen, marking its third European route this year.
bullets: This expansion reflects IndiGo's strategy to increase international connectivity and serve the growing travel demand.
The new route could enhance tourism and trade between India and Denmark.

Infrastructure & Real Estate.title: British Airways to launch third daily London-Delhi flight in 2026, boosting U.K.-India trade amid Prime Minister Starmer’s visit
Infrastructure & Real Estate.one_liner: British Airways plans a third daily flight between London and Delhi starting in 2026.
bullets: British Airways' new flight could enhance U.K.-India trade relations.
The expansion reflects growing demand and strengthens transportation links.

Infrastructure & Real Estate.title: Wipro opens IoT-powered experience centre to boost its lighting, seating businesses
Infrastructure & Real Estate.one_liner: Wipro launched an IoT-powered experience centre to enhance its lighting and seating businesses.
bullets: Wipro opened an IoT experience centre to innovate in lighting and seating.
This initiative could drive growth in smart home solutions.

Infrastructure & Real Estate.title: India to buy missiles worth 50 million from U.K. under new defence deal; 64 Indian firms commit to invest in the U.K.
Infrastructure & Real Estate.one_liner: India enters a £350 million missile deal with the U.K., enhancing defense collaboration.
bullets: The deal includes advancing cooperation on electric engines for Naval ships and significant investments by Indian firms in the U.K.
64 Indian firms aim to invest £1.3 billion in the U.K., fostering economic ties and defense capability enhancement.

Startup.title: Elon Musk settles with fired Twitter executives for undisclosed sum
Startup.one_liner: Elon Musk settles with former Twitter executives after their termination post-acquisition.
bullets: Musk fires key Twitter executives after acquisition; this could influence leadership dynamics in global tech firms including Indian counterparts.
Settlement amount remains undisclosed, reflecting the high stakes involved in tech acquisitions.
